Package com.example.epam.finalProject.Railwayticketoffice.controllers

Class AdminRoutesController

java.lang.Object
com.example.epam.finalProject.Railwayticketoffice.controllers.AdminRoutesController
@Controller public class AdminRoutesController extends Object
The controller 'AdminRoutesController' com.example.epam.finalProject.Railwayticketoffice.controllers. It's responsible for viewing, editing and deleting stations and routes with stops.
